Title: Judgement Night
Writer: Gio Doreuli (dialogue), Giorgi Markozashvili, Nika Oghiashvili (dialogue)
Actors: Levan Bebia, Nika Bekauri, Shota Betlemidze, Inga Buchukuri
Plot: A young woman is a sole survived witness to a murder ; Special agents go into hiding in a big secret house to protect her until the law-court
